name: Feliz NaviDEAD
description:
Happy Cursemas Eve! 

Santa is done being a capitalism slave. Burdened yearly by a cruel 24-hour deadline to bring toys to the boys and girls across the world, just for them to be broken and thrown away and eventually end up in landfills and oceans.

Supported by the Gingerdead Men and his evil Elf Hell-pers, Santa has arrived to bring down mankind with his sack slap!!! 

It is all on you little Sally Sue. Use the provided gifts to help bring the swarm of holly not-so-jolly enemies down. There are gifts that will aid you on your quest but be sure to watch out for the curses placed on them by the deranged Elf Hell-pers. 

Make it rein on the enemies!

Controls:
  • WASD: Move
  • Mouse Pointer: Aim
  • Left Mouse: Shoot
The Team

Mike Arlington 
Alex Roberts Suckerbird Games
Breanna Roberts Suckerbird Games
